item.description:
Apologies for the short notice, this rally came together a few days ago to coincide with Gun Appreciation Day (http://www.gunappreciationday.com) and a good turnout is expected.

Just to clarify, the organizers are not asking folks to carry, just to bring signs. However, open carry IS legal on the Capital grounds, just not in the Capital building or the adjacent Bushnell Park. Of course keep any firearms holstered and remember all it takes is one person to make the whole group look bad.

Parking: The limited free parking at the legislative building is only for weekdays, the metered street parking along the park area might be the best bet; there is also the commercial garage next to the armory but that is a bit more of a walk.

Facebook RSVP is here: http://www.facebook.com/events/462831090443500/

From the Facebook page: Please attend the "Pro 2nd Amendment Rally" at our State Capitol Building 1-19-13 at Noon!!!! We must be heard!! The time is now!! Lets show the world that even in CT, home to Sandy Hook, that we are still united standing for our 2nd Amendment rights!

 

CT Citizen's Defense League post about it here:

http://ccdl.us/blog/2013/01/15/gun-appreciation-day-january-19th/
item.how_to_find_us: Capital building North side, facing Bushnell Park.
item.name: Pro 2nd Amendment Rally - Saturday January 19th
